**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 276 1.1 **Usage** worn armor **Bulk** L varies by armor **Base Material** [Dragonhide](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3268) --- Dragonhide armor is immune to one damage type based on the type of dragon it's made from. Wearing armor made from dragonhide also grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your AC and saving throws against attacks and spells that deal the corresponding damage type. ##
